Plot: A nightmare begins when Rain, a young and beautiful university student, receives an SMS on her mobile phone - "Do you know what the 19th Gate of Hell is?" The same cryptic text message goes...
Title: Dei yuk dai sup gau tsang
Actors: Gillian Chung, Vincy Chan, Patrick Tam, Shaun Tam
Writer: Jun Cai (novel), Sap Sam Chan (screenplay), Miu-Suet Lai (screenplay)
